import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-fetch-data', templateUrl: './fetch-ChatGPT-data.component.html' }) export class FetchChatDataComponent { public APIResponse: ChatGPTResponse[] = []; public SearchText = ''; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { http.get(baseUrl + 'ChatGPTResponse').subscribe(result => { this.APIResponse = result; }, error => console.error(error)); } } let ingredients: string; onSubmit interface ChatGPTResponse { response: string; }
